newsitem.title: USA: Telescan sees Q1 in line with estimates.
newsitem.headline: Telescan sees Q1 in line with estimates.

text.p: Telescan Inc said it expects to report first quarter record revenue and significantly improved operating results of between a $0.01 per share loss and a $0.01 per share profit, which are consistent with previous earnings per share estimates.
It expects to release operating results in the last week of April.

The company said it is providing this information as a result of recent concerns about the performance of its common stock. It said it is unaware of any reasons for the recent decrease in the value of its common stock and expects to continue to show improvements in both revenue and operating results.
